name: Rotational Recall
description:
***************Rotational Recall*****************

Rotational Recall is a puzzle based 2D platform runner made which I developed for Mobile.

The goal of the game is to get your Runner from the start to the end without falling off or hitting an obstacle. However, you have no control over your Runner and can only rotate grid pieces to form a path.

The game focuses on the player remembering the level and rotating the grid based on what is required. If the Runner falls to the grid floor, the level restarts. It is not expected that the player will complete a level on their first attempt.
